description: Try our easy to follow Individual Cheesecakes With Chocolate & Raspberries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Individual Cheesecakes With Chocolate & Raspberries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Grease base and sides of a 6-cup Texan muffin pan. Process biscuits in a food processor until fine crumbs form. Transfer to a bowl, add the butter and mix well to combine. Divide evenly among muffin holes and press firmly over bases. Chill while you prepare the filling.
Wipe clean the food processor. Add cream cheese, ricotta and honey and process until smooth. Add eggs and orange rind and process to combine.
Divide mixture evenly among muffin holes. Bake for 25 minutes or until firm and just set. Remove from oven and leave to cool in pan for 40 minutes before removing.
To remove cheesecakes, run a spatula around the edges, then lift out of the pan. Spoon 1 tbs of the chocolate sauce over each cheesecake, top with raspberries and dust with icing sugar. Serve.
